quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Alvin and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, initials. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these Christmas albums by Alvin and The Chipmunks was released in 1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alvins Christmas Carol

questions.question: How many Grammys did Alvin and The Chipmunks win in 1959?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: Name the Northern Irish band that performed Gloria.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Them

questions.question: What is the correct name of the 1970s rock band that performed the song Babe?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Styx

questions.question: Name the group that recorded the song Funky Nassau.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Beginning of the End

questions.question: In what year did the first animated Alvin and The Chipmunks series The Alvin Show appear on television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1961

questions.question: What is the correct name of the group that performed the song Ma Belle Amie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tee Set

questions.question: What groundbreaking motion picture of 1967 featured the Simon and Garfunkel song. Mrs. Robinson?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Graduate

questions.question: Which musical duo had a hit in 1971 with a popular cover version of Creedence Clearwater Revivals Proud Mary?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ike and Tina Turner

questions.question: The song Lady Jane was featured on what 1966 album by The Rolling Stones?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aftermath

questions.question: Actress Kim Basinger is prominently featured in the video for what 1993 Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers hit?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary Janes Last Dance

questions.question: Which of these is not an album by Alvin and The Chipmunks?

options.text: When You Wish Upon a Chipmunk

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hard Rock Chipmunks

questions.question: In what year did Alvin and the Chimpmunks make their debut as a singing group?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1958

questions.question: What are the initials used by the group that recorded the hit single The Sound of Philadelphia (TSOP)?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: MFSB

questions.question: Where does the title of The Beatles song Polythene Pam come from?

options.text: One of the members was married to a woman named Pamela.
It came form the nickname of a Beatles fan.
One of the members had a daughter named Pamela.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It came form the nickname of a Beatles fan.
